content.text: Hi, I run a pet accessories brand in the UK. Looking to source custom dog harnesses - I found this on Alibaba as reference: https://www.alibaba.com/product/123456. Want 500 units with our logo. Can you help?

Great to meet you! Custom dog harnesses are a solid category â€” here's what I can tell you right away:

For 500 units with custom logo, you're looking at roughly *$3-8/unit* depending on material (nylon webbing is cheapest, padded mesh or neoprene runs higher). At that quantity, most factories can do custom logo printing or embossing no problem.

Let me pull up that reference so I can give you more specific pricing ðŸ‘‡

Could you share a photo or screenshot of the harness style you like? (Alibaba links don't always load on our end, and a photo helps us match the exact design with our supplier network.)

We want padded breathable mesh. Main colour sage green. Our logo embroidered on the chest strap. Need sizes S/M/L. Budget around 3-4 GBP per unit. Timeline: need them by May for summer launch. Ship to Manchester UK

Really clear brief â€” love it. Padded mesh with embroidery is a popular combo right now.

Quick reality check on budget: *Â£3-4 GBP (~$3.80-5 USD)* per unit for padded mesh with embroidery across 3 sizes is tight but doable at 500 units. Embroidery adds ~$0.30-0.50/unit vs printing. If budget gets squeezed, heat transfer logo is a cheaper alternative that still looks clean.

For timeline â€” if we get this moving soon, production ~20-25 days + sea freight to Manchester ~25-30 days puts you right at May. Air freight (5-7 days) is a backup if production runs long, just adds ~$1-2/unit.

One question: do you need custom packaging (branded boxes, hang tags) or is polybag fine? *(this affects unit cost â€” branded packaging can add $0.30-1/unit)*
Polybag is fine for now. Our brand is PawPath. Contact is James at james@pawpath.co.uk. Can we get samples first before committing to 500?

Absolutely â€” sampling first is the smart move. Here's a recap of your sourcing request:

- *Product:* Custom padded mesh dog harness, sage green
- *Sizes:* S / M / L
- *Branding:* "PawPath" logo embroidered on chest strap
- *Quantity:* 500 units
- *Budget:* Â£3-4/unit ($3.80-5 USD)
- *Packaging:* Polybag
- *Delivery to:* Manchester, UK
- *Timeline:* May 2025
- *Contact:* James â€” james@pawpath.co.uk

We also have a *$100 sample voucher* you can use toward your samples, so you can test quality before committing to bulk.

I'll get this to our sourcing team â€” expect supplier options and quotes within 24-48 hours via email. Anything you'd like to add or change?
